review: You only pay once when you purchase it, no monthly fees. It is very easy to set up to your HD TV and can be moved from one TV to another and resume its function by just plugging it in and out without any problem. I use it to watch free movies through Amazon Prime. There are a few newer movies, many TV Series and many older movies. It has a pay-per view option, too. The options for using the Fire TV Stick are tremendous, some are at extra charge. It can stream movies through all kinds of sources you may be affiliated with. You can play games too (requires the purchase f a special controller). Most of the time the streaming flows without buffering. I found out that It has problems buffering around 6PM and 12AM. I believe the bandwidth of my wireless is compromised at that time, and I will have to call my internet provider about that problem.
